title: October 9, 2013
author: Orac
cleaned_text: It's rare to find a naturopath who isn't antivaccine. Sadly, even naturopaths who proclaim their fealty to vaccines as safe and effective disease prevention often betray antivaccine beliefs. It's rare to find a naturopath who isn't antivaccine.
